title: Is This Ear Technology The Future?
description: Skybuds Nimbus (USA Link) -  Skybuds Nimbus (International) -   Here's a completely wireless earbud solution as an alternative to Apple AirPods.  More info from the manufacturer -  Listen. Talk. Go. Skybuds revolutionize the way you listen & move with 24 hrs of on-the-go charge & the strongest connection available on the market using absolutely no wires, and can connect with any Bluetooth device. Skybuds are the next generation of truly wireless, perfect for the most active gym-goer or traveler. Skybuds have been specifically engineered to have a comfortable and secure fit ensuring they dont fall out. Skybuds, Simply Truly Wireless.  Skybuds pioneer the joint use of NFMI technology and Bluetooth technology to ensure the strongest, reliable connection available on the market.  A sleek, ergonomic design plus 3 different sized fit tips (S, M, L) create a personalized and secure fit every time. Plus Skybuds are sweatproof and water-resistant - the perfect companion for workouts.  Each Skybud has a digital MEMS microphone so you can also take calls while on-the-go hands and wire-free.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
